|stock_os=Linux;2.6.22; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, Tomato Hyzoom, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=CiscoXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Cisco[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_pass=admin |oui=C8:D7:19 |oui_eth=C8:D7:19 }} ''' AC1750 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Wireless Router''' :[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-product/?pid=01t80000003KQoBAAW Support page] "3751-24600104R" is silkscreened on the BCM4360 wireless module. :1MB Serial Flash + 128MB NAND Flash :C8:D7:19 OUI {{WiFiCert|WFA15975|07/16/2012}} ===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/31802-cisco-unveils-its-draft-80211ac-router-and-bridge ''Cisco Unveils Its Draft 802.11ac Router and Bridge'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/tomato-hyzoom-bwq518-releases.70364/#post-252949 ''EA6500v1 Hyzoom test build'' on '''linksysinfo.org'''] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=162802 ''Fractal's post'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] :(w/ serial dump) - ''DD-WRT'' test build on page 5 ===CFE log===
